reviews.review: Anita is an amazing teacher that encourages interesting discussions. If you have a chance to take her for EDCI411, do it! We spent most of the class discussing and had interesting readings every week which we discussed in class. Class is based on participation, so must go to class.
The best!!! Such a caring and kind professor. Take her class if you like to work with kids or tutor. Easy A and you get valuable experience!
